import os

        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.57efa70b:
X = librosa.stft(data)
amp = librosa.amplitude_to_db(abs(X))
plt.figure(figsize=(14,6))
librosa.display.specshow(amp,sr=sr,x_axis='time',y_axis='hz')
plt.colorbar()
